2064.subject: HPWE
2064.descrlong: Provides an in-depth, integrated understanding of the physiological responses and adaptations to, and the biomechanics of, aerobic activity, exercise, and sport.  Emphasizes the concept that the physiology of aerobic energy production, and the biomechanics of aerobic energy use, is linked in physical activity, exercise and sport.
